title: Strange Flower (Little Sister of the Poor)
medium: Various charcoals, with touches of black chalk and black Conté crayon, stumping, incising and erasing, on yellowish cream wove paper altered to a golden tone
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. David Adler Collection

thumbnail.alt_text: A work made of various charcoals, with touches of black chalk and black conté crayon, stumping, incising and erasing, on yellowish cream wove paper altered to a golden tone.
